alt: Illustrations by Edith Pritchett for the Guardian
article_heading: ‘You can’t build muscle as a vegan’ – and 13 other plant-based myths, busted
description: The image depicts an animated character, a man, who appears to be in a state of exertion. He is wearing a sleeveless red tank top and blue shorts, which are typical attire for someone engaging in physical activity. His arms are raised above his head, and he is holding a barbell with two bunches of carrots attached to it. The carrots are bright orange and have green tops, indicating they are fresh. The man has a mustache and is smiling, suggesting he is enjoying the activity. His posture and facial expression convey a sense of strength and determination. The background is a solid, light blue color, which puts the focus entirely on the character and his actions

article_heading: Lifestyle changes key to preventing heart disease: experts
description: The image shows a close-up of a person's hands gently cradling a large, glossy red heart. The heart is held between the palms of the hands, which are slightly cupped to support its shape. The background is blurred, focusing the viewer's attention on the heart and the hands. The skin of the hands appears smooth, and the fingers are slightly spread apart, suggesting a gentle and caring gesture. The image conveys a sense of love, affection, or perhaps a symbolic representation of the human heart.

article_heading: ‘I love you but I hate you.’ What to do when you can’t stand your long-term partner
description: The image features a stylized representation of a heart, which is split in half along a diagonal line. The left side of the heart is slightly larger than the right side, and both halves are filled with a textured pattern that resembles a rough, cracked surface. The color of the heart is a soft, muted pink. On the left side of the heart, the word "I" is written in a bold, black, uppercase font. The right side of the heart contains the word "LOVE" in the same bold, black, uppercase font, but the word "YOU" is written in a smaller, more delicate font directly below "LOVE." The text is centered within the heart, and the overall style of the image is reminiscent of a hand-drawn illustration with a touch of grunge or distressed aesthetic. The background of the image is a solid, deep red color that contrasts with the pink of the heart.

alt: This 2017 image shows a salad recipe with arugula orange slices and pomegranate seeds.
article_heading: Pomegranate seeds add flair and tradition to a Rosh Hashanah salad
description: The image shows a vibrant and appetizing salad served in a white bowl. The salad is a mix of fresh greens, including what appears to be arugula or a similar leafy green, with its distinctive dark green color and slightly bitter flavor. Scattered throughout the salad are slices of orange, which add a pop of color and a hint of sweetness to the dish. The oranges are cut into thin, round slices, revealing their juicy interior. Adding a touch of color and texture, there are also red pomegranate seeds sprinkled over the salad. These seeds have a tart and sweet flavor that contrasts with the greens and oranges. The salad is garnished with thinly sliced red onions, which add a sharp, pungent flavor that complements the other ingredients. The salad is presented on a wooden table, which provides a rustic and warm backdrop to the dish. To the right of the bowl, there's a fork with a wooden handle, suggesting that the salad is ready to be enjoyed. The overall presentation of the salad is appealing, with the colors of the ingredients contrasting nicely against the white bowl and the wooden table. The image does not contain any text.

alt: Agolde Luna barrel-leg jeans. Photograph: David Newby/The Guardian. Stylist: Melanie Wilkinson
article_heading: Baggy jeans are back, and the barrel-leg is the grown-up way to do them
description: The image shows a person standing against a plain, light-colored background. The individual is wearing a brown leather jacket over a dark top, paired with high-waisted white trousers. The trousers are straight-legged and appear to be of a light fabric, possibly cotton or linen. The person is also wearing open-toe, high-heeled sandals that have a metallic finish. The person's hair is styled in a way that it falls over the shoulders, and they are looking slightly to the side with a neutral expression. The lighting in the image is soft and even, highlighting the textures of the clothing and the skin tone of the person. The overall style of the image suggests it could be for fashion or lifestyle purposes.
